FeedService - Class in com.soprabanking.ips.services

fetchAllComments(Long) - Method in class com.soprabanking.ips.daos.CommentDAO
This is a method used to fetch all comments on a proposal using the proposal id in a list.
fetchAllProposals(String) - Method in class com.soprabanking.ips.services.FeedService
Returns a List of all the Proposal objects stored in database in response to the specified Request Body String containing the following: A Start Date and an End Date to specify the time duration for filtering of Proposal objects based on their Creation dates.Only the proposals created in the specified time duration will be included in the result. A Page value for specifying the Page Number in order to implement pagination of the resulting list of proposals.
fetchAllProposals(Date, Date, Pageable) - Method in class com.soprabanking.ips.daos.ProposalDAO
A method to get a slice of all the proposals in the database between give start and end dates

This method returns list of the team which are in database
fetchAllUpvotes(Long) - Method in class com.soprabanking.ips.daos.UpvotesDAO
This method is used to fetch all the upvotes on a proposal
fetchUserProposals(Long, Date, Date, Pageable) - Method in class com.soprabanking.ips.daos.ProposalDAO
It shows all of user proposals by the given start and end date
fetchUserProposals(String) - Method in class com.soprabanking.ips.services.FeedService
Returns a List of all the Proposal objects created by a particular User in response to the specified Request Body String containing the following: A Start Date and an End Date to specify the time duration for filtering of Proposal objects based on their Creation dates.Only the proposals created in the specified time duration will be included in the result. A Page value for specifying the Page Number in order to implement pagination of the resulting list of proposals.

This method is used to find a slice between the given start and end date of all the proposals in the database

findAllByProposalIdOrderByCreationDateDesc(Long) - Method in interface com.soprabanking.ips.repositories.CommentRepository
This method is used to find all the comments made on a proposal by the proposal id and sort those proposals on the basis of the creation date in a descending order.
